title: Mike Gill Sr's Evidence to Attorney Andrew Lelling (United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusets)

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Mike Gill Sr's Evidence to Attorney Andrew Lelling (United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusets)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Michael Gill Sr of 69 Conleys Grove Road, Derry, New Hampshire sent three folders of evidence to US Attorney Andrew Lelling dated June 17 and postmarked July 18 2018. Confirmation of receipt by Andrew Lelling was sent on July 30, 2018.

Firstly I request that the US Attorney's Office confirm that everything listed on that receipt is still in their possession, secondly I request electronic copies, preferably in PDF format, of as much as possible of the three folders of evidence (disregard the electronic evidence, just the paper evidence) described in the sending cover letter:

1) Morris Mahoney and Liberty Mutual et cetera
2) IRS Boston office et cetera
3) Drug cartel activity et cetera

The three folders were sent as part of the same evidence package, I have specified the package, specified the receipt. Links to the receipt and the cover letter itself can be found on the blockchain here:

The receipt letter from Attorney Andrew Lelling is attached.
https://cdn.muckrock.com/outbound_request_attachments/PatrickMockridge/172491/-Frdpos1Wb9SAAXvl0aQ6Gk7zUACJoEior2rXno82Fo.png
https://cdn.muckrock.com/outbound_request_attachments/PatrickMockridge/172491/NZJpiAI-_r7I040hTvJwD8s-jat0FGEjx3H4OIH3wIs.png

That information corroborates the dates.

The cover letter can be found here:
https://arweave.net/RH6dzdYRQZwqUL2n2-fSNgpQwr8q8iUvNXNNV94x5RE
https://arweave.net/JQYd0ty5i3_9Rjd31FqhD7Ev_TAU7fbP2hp0sqqFnWQ
https://arweave.net/-Uy9dB1tRp4Xgv2N_4tABZDTqF-HRmpR_efJELrLB5s

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maria Obringer

communications.subject: RE: Freedom of Information Act Request: Mike Gill Sr's Evidence to Attorney Andrew Lelling (United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusets)
communications.communication: There is a current a Case Number EOUSA-2024-003101 pertaining to this subject.
